title: Fails to build on main without bevy_mesh/morph feature

labels.name: A-Rendering
labels.description: Drawing game state to the screen

labels.name: P-Regression
labels.description: Functionality that used to work but no longer does. Add a test for this!

labels.name: S-Ready-For-Implementation
labels.description: This issue is ready for an implementation PR. Go for it!

labels.name: P-Compile-Failure
labels.description: A failure to compile Bevy apps

labels.name: X-Uncontroversial
labels.description: This work is generally agreed upon

labels.name: D-Straightforward
labels.description: Simple bug fixes and API improvements, docs, test and examples

body:
## Bevy version and features

af5f307dd

> cargo build --no-default-features --features std,x11,bevy_winit,bevy_state,bevy_window,bevy_pbr,bevy_sprite,bevy_text,bevy_core_pipeline,bevy_picking,bevy_animation,png,zstd_rust,tonemapping_luts,ktx2


```
bevy on î‚  main [$?] is ðŸ“¦ v0.18.0-dev via ðŸ¦€ v1.91.0-nightly

error: could not compile `bevy_pbr` (lib) due to 4 previous errors
```

This feature set worked on `v0.17.0-rc.2` I think

I believe the problem was introduced in 

https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/pull/21389
